actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands and Environmental Regulation

official_title: To establish the Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area in the State of Washington, and for other purposes.
short_title: Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area Act
subjects: Wilderness and natural areas, wildlife refuges, wild rivers, habitats

summary.text: Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area Act - Establishes the Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area in the state of Washington. Designates the Mountains to Sound Greenway Trust as the local coordinating entity for the Heritage Area. Requires the Mountains to Sound Greenway Trust to prepare and submit a management plan for the Heritage Area.

titles.title: Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area Act
To establish the Mountains to Sound Greenway National Heritage Area in the State of Washington, and for other purposes.
